channel.title: Re installing
channel.description: If i were to re install windows do i delete anything or just re start computer with the disk in?

item.title: Re installing
item.dc:creator: @BlazezFire BlazezFire
item.description:
@BlazezFire wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:3, topic:258181”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=340897.msg2640146#msg2640146 date=1232806226]
I know that all the setup disks using NT (2000+) have a partitioner built inside the installer.You can simply delete your old partition and make a new one. Im not sure about DOS though?
[/quote]

Windows 3.1 and up has a partition editor at least.

If you don’t want to save any information, just restart with the disk in, like you said.[/quote]
Ah okay thanks.

Read full topic

item.title: Re installing

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Windows 3.1 and up has a partition editor at least.

If you don’t want to save any information, just restart with the disk in, like you said.
